subject: re:On-line generic store
body:
Dear customer.
We are happy to inform you about the start of a huge sale of high-quality GENERIC drugs in our Canadian Web pharmacy. Best pills by licensed manufacturers all at real tiny prices.
CanadianPharmacy #1 Canadian discount Web pharmacy. Save a lot with CanadianPharmacy and its laughable prices for top-quality generic medications purchased straight from the manufacturer. The quality of the medications we sell is constantly monitored by FDA that's why it always stays indubitable.
Don't look for prices lower than those at CanadianPharmacy anything that is cheaper is a fake.
Yours faithfully,Carlo Rowe
